document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Rainbow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">coming </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">Fair! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9c88ff">Vision </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">World </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Cashmere </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">confidently </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">else </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Peacock's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">purple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">train </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Feather </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">feather </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">plain </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Fritters </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">itself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">dreamy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Butterflies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">bestir! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Lethargic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">pools </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">resume </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">whirr </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">last </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">year's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">sundered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">tune </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">From </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">old </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">Fortress </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Sun </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Baronial </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Bees </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">march </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">murmuring </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">platoon! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">robins </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">stand </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">thick </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">today </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">flakes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">snow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">did, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">yesterday </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">On </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">fence, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">roof </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">twig </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Orchis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">binds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">feather </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">old </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">lover </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">Don </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">Sun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Revisiting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Bog. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Commander </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">countless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">still </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Regiments </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Wood </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">Hill </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">bright </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">detachments </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">stand! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Behold! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">multitudes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">these? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">Children </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Turbaned </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">seas </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Circassian </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">Land! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Some rainbow coming from the fair!
